creator: baudouin.dupont@ext.ec.europa.eu
text:
I would like to use the FTP Request Sampler.  For the moment, the FTP port cannot be specified, it uses the default FTP port (21).  I would like to be able to specify another port because my data center has set it to 7009.

I am using JMeter Version 2.3.2 r665936

Thanks,
Baudouin Dupont

Thanks for the suggestion, it has been added to SVN and will be in the next release.

URL: http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=785454&view=rev
Log:
Bug 47266 - FTP Request Sampler: allow specifying an FTP port, other than the default
